StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateCampusContact]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CampusContactID uniqueiden..er, @SchoolCode int, @FiscalYear int, @PointOfContactID uniqueiden..er, @UserLogin varchar(50) --@UpdateDate, date.me,>)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @CollegePro.leID uniqueiden..er
Select @CollegePro.leID = CollegePro.leID FROM [USMC].CollegePro.le cp where School_Code = @SchoolCode and FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].CampusContact WHERE CampusContactID = @CampusContactID)
BEGIN UPDATE CampusContact SET [CollegePro.leID] = @CollegePro.leID, [PointOfContactID] = @PointOfContactID, [UserLogin] = @UserLogin
WHERE CampusContactID = @CampusContactID
END
ELSE
BEGIN INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CampusContact] ([CampusContactID],
[CollegePro.leID] ,[PointOfContactID], [UserLogin] ,[UpdateDate])
VALUES (@CampusContactID, @CollegePro.leID, @PointOfContactID, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
